summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Western Avenue, from University Street to a point one hundred and twenty (120) feet north of Madison Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein a sewer of the proper dimensions and material, together with all the necessary catch basins, manholes and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 68 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
